active_learning.discussion_prompt: In hybrid environments, debate whether increasing AAL from 1 to 3 significantly reduces incident risks, using NIST SP 800-63B as reference. Consider trade-offs in usability vs. security, common misconceptions like MFA being infallible, and real-world examples like MFA fatigue attacks.
